description:
This is the Annual Coding Competition. Here are the steps to participate:

1. Registration: Register for the competition by filling out the form on our website. Registration opens on January 1, 2023 and closes on January 31, 2023.

2. **Preparation**: Once registered, you will receive an email with preparation materials and resources. Use these to prepare for the competition.

3. **Submission**: Submit your project before the deadline on February 28, 2023. Submissions must include your code and a README explaining your project.

4. **Judging**: Projects will be judged based on creativity, originality, and adherence to the theme. Judging will take place from March 1, 2023 to March 15, 2023.

5. **Announcement of Winners**: Winners will be announced on our website and social media channels on March 20, 2023. Prizes include cash awards, certificates, and more.

6. **Feedback**: All participants will receive feedback on their projects after the competition.

We look forward to your participation!
